UK: Apple Inc. gives away 4,800 units of the latest iPhone 7 for only £1

Here's why they sell their brand new smartphone model worth $899 / piece for only £1

  • By Evan Gibson
  • 1,791,978
  • 442

If you live in the UK, this could be the best news you've heard in a while.

This week, Apple is celebrating its 30th anniversary! 30 years ago, Apple launched its first products in several European capitals: Rome, London, Amsterdam, Paris, Berlin and Barcelona. Since then, Apple has seen one of the strongest growths in the market, with Europe's most affordable consumer electronics, including smartphones, televisions, computers, and tablets.

Last year, Apple won 10 different awards for their innovative and revolutionary products and developments. The company was also ranked No. 1 by consumers for the ease of use of its products.

To celebrate this success, Apple has launched a number of generous promotions in various European countries. In Germany, they sell 4,000 TVs worth £500 each for just £10. In France, Apple sells 12,000 latest tablets worth £400 for just £5. In the Netherlands, they sell 20,000 Macbooks valued at £1,900 ​​for only £50.

Here in the UK, Apple launched its generous promotion last week and sold 5,000 of its latest Apple iPhone 7 (starting price: £899) for only £1 a piece.

Mr. Kalsson, sales manager for Apple UK explains:

"We are convinced that with such generous promotions in the UK, we will gain a significant amount of market share with new customers eventually becoming loyal customers. They will spread the news to their friends and in the end, more people will know about us and buy our products".

Why £1?

This promotion is actually a gift from Apple Inc. The customer only has to pay the total amount of £1 for delivery cost.

Here is how to get a new Apple iPhone 7 for only £1:


  • Visit the official Apple campaign site for the UK.
  • This promotion is reserved for UK residents living in the UK. Limited to one smartphone per person!
  • This online promotion does not accept cash payments. The shipping amount of £1 is the only amount that will be charged to your credit card. Make sure your card is valid for this transaction to be approved.
  • Confirm your address to let Apple know where to send your smartphone. It could take between 2-5 business days for your phone to be shipped and delivered.
ORDER YOUR IPHONE 7 FOR ONLY £1
Available on

Does it sound too good to be true?

53-year-old Maria Ollila from London thought the same thing. She decided to go through with the campaign and she received a £1 iPhone 7 in the mail three days later.

Maria's iphone 7 arrived after three business days.

"First I thought that this was another internet scam, but I did my own research campaigning company is a legitimate partner of Apple Inc., so I decided to risk £1... it's less than a cup of Starbucks coffee anyways. 3 days later I checked my mailbox and it turned out to be my lucky day, a brand new iPhone in black!"

There are only 4,800 smartphones available and 1,200+ have already been claimed. Don't miss out on this opportunity!.


Reference: Apple Campaign Site UK - Official Website
